wikipedia_page.main: Jane Elizabeth Stuart Lighting FRSA FRTS (born 22 December 1956) is a former Chief Executive of Five (TV) in the United Kingdom.

response: It was revealed by The Observer that a crisis meeting had taken place on 26 September by the heads of the BBC, ITV, Channel 4 and Channel 5. Mark Thompson, Michael Grade, Andy Duncan and Jane Lighting were all in attendance, to discuss their attempt to "restore public trust in broadcasting".
